entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
